pageTitle: Deputy Prime Minister’s itinerary for Tuesday, December 3, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Winnipeg, Manitoba

1:00 p.m. The Deputy Prime Minister will meet with the Mayor of Winnipeg, Brian Bowman. The Prime Minister’s special representative for the Prairies, Jim Carr, will also attend.

Office of the Mayor
Winnipeg City Hall
510 Main Street

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
  • Media should arrive no later than 12:30 p.m.

3:00 p.m. The Deputy Prime Minister will meet with the Premier of Manitoba, Brian Pallister. The Prime Minister’s special representative for the Prairies, Jim Carr, will also attend.

Office of the Premier
Manitoba Legislative Building
450 Broadway

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
  • Media should arrive no later than 2:30 p.m.
